verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: At a campaign rally in Nashville] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: repeated] [ARG1: a bushelful of false and misleading claims] , and added a few new ones . The post FactChecking Trump ’s Nashville Rally appeared first on FactCheck.org .
